Losus
Friday, December 22nd, 2017, 6:56:38 AM

So I haven't been in Illistim too long but wanted to say that everyone I have encountered is super nice and very helpful.

I am not a huge RP person, I love hunting and guild work but my limited interactions with folks have been very positive. I have stayed in every town now and they (Illistim folks) get an A+. I look forward to my extended stay here.

-Playe of Losus and Hnarl
